headline: CME Group Adjusted Interest Rate Total Return Futures Reach Record Open Interest of 1 Million Contracts
summary: CME Group, the world's leading derivatives marketplace, today announced that its suite of Adjusted Interest Rate (AIR) Total Return futures reached an open interest (OI) record of more than 1 million contracts (equivalent to $365 billion notional) as well as a single-day volume record of 109,000 contracts (equivalent to $40 billion notional) on September 11.

content.title: CME Group Adjusted Interest Rate Total Return Futures Reach Record Open Interest of 1 Million Contracts

headline: How New Advanced Options Analytics May Shape CME Group (CME) Amid Surging Derivatives Demand
summary: Earlier this month, CME Group introduced enhanced analytics tools for options market participants, now offering real-time and historical data on key metrics such as Greeks and implied volatility for the top 40 futures contracts across all major asset classes. This launch responds directly to record options trading volumes and rising client demand for deeper insights to guide risk management and trading strategies. We’ll explore how these advanced analytics tools may impact CME Group’s...
